thread.section_title: Craft Cuts Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Craft Cuts | craftcuts.com
thread.title: Tracey Campbell
thread.title_full: Craft Cuts reviewed by Tracey Campbell

author: Tracey Campbell
title: Tracey Campbell
text:
From the start, this company has it together. The ordering was easy, even when I made a mistake, they were very kind and helpful in correcting MY error. The product shipped and arrived on time.
The Heart is beautiful! I can't wait to start the project!!! Love the step by step videos. What a plus
